name: Square Arena
description: Square Arena is a multiplayer arena game where each player controls a Ku-Bot and tries to defeat his opponent using one of the various weapons in the Arena. But the main characteristic of Square Arena is it's RANDOMNESS: Players will face random rule changes every 30 seconds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 530 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is no way to invite friends to play
